title: Hydrogen peroxide assisted synthesis of fluorescent carbon nanoparticles from teak leaves for dye-sensitized solar cells
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00452J, Paper
Open Access

Arup Kumer Roy, William Ghann, Saswata Rabi, Jackson Barua, Sumit Majumder, Ruhul Amin, M. K. Mohammad Ziaul Hyder, Jamal Uddin
Fluorescent carbon nanoparticles (FCNs) have emerged as promising sensitizers for dye-sensitized solar cells (DSSCs) owing to their unique optical properties and low-cost fabrication.
